transcript:
aapne jis vyakti ko call kiya hai, woh abhi dusre call par vyast hai. kripya pratiksha karein ya kuch samay pashchat prayas karein. the person you have called is speaking to someone else. you can wait or call again later.
Hello
Hai sir.
Hello
Sir, this is Sane Prakash from IndiaMART.
Yes.
Sir, this side, sir actually I have called you regarding your service feedback sir. Actually I just we are not getting benefits.
Actually I am talking right now from one of one of your one of your colleagues.
Okay, okay. I don't know her name would be sir. I don't know sir. I don't know her name but she is on. Is it a lady sir?
Okay, okay sir please. You can ask sir. I'll I am.
Okay.
Aap jis vyakti
Hello.
Hello ma'am.
Hello.
Han, aap hi ki side pe call kiya tha dobara bhi.
Sir, uske baad mein tumhi bol raha hu.
Han, baat baat kar sakte hai, mein sun raha hu.
Han, baat kare.
Ji.
Okay. Haan, nahi sir bata rahe the ki unko jo leads aati hai na woh irrelevant leads aati hai. Woh jis product mein nahi karte.
Han, toh woh irrelevant hai. Toh maine bola hai sir ko ki ek baar maine approach kiya hai ki aap video meet pe aaiye kal hum category mapping iski ek baar correct kar lete hai. Usme kuch galat hai toh. Uske basis pe phir hum ek discussion kar sakte hai aage.
Thik hai aap video meeting arrange kar lo sir. Sir kitne baje ka time rahega aapka?
Han, sir mein 2 baje something free rehta hu agar aap chahe toh us time pe hum kar sakte hai.
2 baje ka. Sir dekhiye maine aapko calendar video meeting ka invite bhej diya kal ke date ke liye, thik hai? Haan. So that ki aapka calendar book rahe sir. Maine apna calendar book kar diya aapke saath meeting karne ke liye. Mein bhi available rahunga uske andar mein try karunga apni side se. Maine aap bol diya sir aapko meeting link bhej diya maine.
Mujhe Manish ne bataya ki jo upgrade jo rehte hai na.
Han han. Jaise ki upgrade karte ho matlab ki humne agar hum apna subscription upgrade kare.
Upgrade tak bol rahe hai.
Han han han. Upgrade upgrade upgrade like upgrade hoti hai sir.
Bilkul. Haan. Toh sir mein ye jaanna chahta hu agar hume upgrade ke baad hi saare benefits milne wale the toh hume jaise ki sales team ne aapke ne pitch kiya tha hume ye wala offer.
Hum hum. Then why he pitched us that offer instead of the upgrade version?
Sir basic plan thing sir. At IndiaMART na, we always for the first time client, see there is a pattern that has to be created right? Then the services that has to be new. Aap jo amount de rahe ho right? Agar aap ek bada amount pay karte ho sir ya higher services lete ho, you will be expecting a ROI from the. Uska amount aapne invest kiya jyada rehta hai. Yaha pe kya hota hai sir aap yaha pe abhi kaam dekhte ho, leads samajhte ho, services samajhte ho, usme kya hai kya nahi hai. Isi mein sir hum aapko basic package launch karte hai. Because that will help you to create your performer yaha pe. Aapka buyer base banane ke liye. Once.
To isme jab aap samajh jaate hai cheezo ko toh. Haan haan. Haan sir. Please bataye. Aaj ye new customer. Ek baar according 30k ka bhi humne maan liya aapka 30k ka hai. But at least usko jo aap usme 30k invest kiya utna toh usko return hona chahiye na.
Nahi. Sir. Sir utna kyun sir agar hum sirf utna hi dene lage na. Sir agar hum utna hi dene lage toh IndiaMART ka operation hi nahi rahega sir. Aap aap hamesha kabhi bhi jisme invest karte hai usse jyada ka expectation hi kya karenge aapko.
Sir that's the thing I want to hear. That's the thing I want to hear. Kyunki because mere ko aisa lag raha hai sir ki jo maine invest kiya hai. Jo mera 30k already which I have already. Maine usko invest karke usi 30k ke liye dobara kaam kar raha hu. Like maine khud ka paisa khud ko kisi ko deke usi ke liye mein kaam kar raha hu.
Just like that. Sahi bol rahe hai sir aap bilkul.
Han. Sir aapko sara problem sab kuch jo hai na. Haan haan. Bataye.
Sure sure sure. Kal kal aap ek baar baat kar lenge koi issue nahi hai okay sir. Aap kal ekdum detail mein achha lead ka bhi feedback jo bhi hai aap kaise follow kar rahe hai kya hai saare cheeze ek ek karke baat karenge sir. Har ek lead pe har ek inquiry pe bhi baat kar lenge aap chahiye toh. Is tarah se kya conversion ho sakta hai kya better kar sakte hai. Sab kuch ek ek discussion ek ek point pe kar lenge, thik hai sir?
But sir kindly is baar resolution provide karaiye. Kyunki mein bahut baar se frustrate ho chuka hu mein isliye mein bol raha hu. Sir pichli baar bhi kaafi logo se baat kar chuka hu kehte hai lead kar lo aap sahi kar denge, lead kar lo aap sahi kar denge. But resolution kuch bhi nahi aata hai ab tak zero bataunga mein isliye mein no satisfied mein isiliye karta hu har baar jab bhi feedback ke liye aata hai. Ki mein satisfied hi nahi hu kyun karunga satisfied.
Thik hai sir. Ek baar aise aapne bola na isko finally resolve kariye phir baith ke isko resolve karte hai iske saath. Thik hai? Ji ji sure sure. Thank thank you. Thik hai sir. What's your good name?
Sir my name is Sane Prakash.
Okay sir. Thank you.
Okay.
Thank thank you. Okay thik hai sir kal connect karte hai. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting benefits from subscription.

- Customer feels he is working for IndiaMART.

- No resolution provided in the past.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a video meeting for tomorrow.

- Executive assured resolution will be provided this time.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

frustrate

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, upgrade, leads, resolution, video meeting
